item.title: Visibility
item.description: Name Value Assembly Catel.MVVM Namespace System.Windows Available on Xamarin - Android public enum Visibility : Enum Base types Enum Specifies the display state of an element. Fields Collapsed Completely hidden, as if the view had not been added. Hidden Not displayed, but taken into account during layout (space is left for it). Visible Visible on screen; the default value.
